nodes.text: Michael Kirkbride is a concept artist, writer, and game designer credited as "Special Thanks" in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. He was part of the design team that came up with the game's plot.

His contributions were writing lines for Darth Vader and coming up with the idea that he was the unknowing catalyst for what would become the Rebellion, with irony his plan would prove to be his final undoing. He also made sure that Galen Marek died as defeating the Emperor and redeeming Vader was the work of a new hope, an innocent.
